page.title: 01St.Andrews, North East Fife
page.content: {St. Andrews}is situated in the{North {East District}of{Fife Region.} The population of the town, including students is around 15 000. During the Summer holiday season the population is almost doubled when visitors and tourists are taken into account. St. Andrews is a{University Town}with a student population of around 4 000. It is also a popular{Holiday Resort} with extensive sandy beaches. The town is steeped in history and there are several{Historical Sites}to interest visitors. It is also a popular{Golfing Centre,} having five golf courses. The countryside around the town is mostly farmland.On the outskirts there is a 50 acre country park called{ {Craigtoun Country Park. } There is a{Tourist Information Centre} situated in South Street.
